name: Darth Vader's Lightsaber
description:
Darth Vader's Lightsaber 

Just a cool and simple project to learn the basics of Kaboom and Aseprite. First result after few hours of work.

Do not spam the space bar. Actually, the "saberIdle" loop is not managed very well.

  • Development with JavaScript and Kaboom game library
  • Sound from free web library and edited to match with the project
  • Sprite made with Aseprite (copied from the Pixel Studio's intro video on steam)

I'll try to improve the sprite to add movements and, maybe, combats. Could be cool to slay this rebel scum !
